import React from 'react' import './blog.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; function Blog() { const {t, i18n} = useTranslation(); const blogMainImg = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.blogMainImg) const blogPhoneMainImg = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.blogPhoneMainImg) return (

{t("Blog")}

{t("Blog-txt")}

{t}

) } export default Blog
